translation: The mere thought of her using my weapon...{LF}Such...wondrous humiliation...
source: The mere thought of her using my weapon...{LF}Such...wondrous humiliation...

translation: Here you go, "Lady Zero." Maybe this'll help.
source: Here you go, "Lady Zero." Maybe this'll help.

translation: Mikhail evolved into his second form!
source: Mikhail evolved into his second form!

translation: Mikhail evolved into his final form!
source: Mikhail evolved into his final form!

translation: Request unlocked in the Land of Seas.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.
source: Request unlocked in the Land of Seas.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.

translation: Request unlocked in the Land of Mountains.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.
source: Request unlocked in the Land of Mountains.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.

translation: Request unlocked in the Land of Forests.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.
source: Request unlocked in the Land of Forests.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.

translation: Request unlocked in the Land of Sands.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.
source: Request unlocked in the Land of Sands.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.

translation: Request unlocked in the Cathedral City.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.
source: Request unlocked in the Cathedral City.{LF}Access it from the Chapter Select menu.

translation: Thank you for letting me join you, my lady.{LF}Please, keep this as a symbol of my loyalty.
source: Thank you for letting me join you, my lady.{LF}Please, keep this as a symbol of my loyalty.

translation: I want nothing more than to serve my Intoner...{LF}And perhaps look good while doing it.
source: I want nothing more than to serve my Intoner...{LF}And perhaps look good while doing it.

translation: You've been cleanin' up lately.{LF}Maybe you can handle this now.
source: You've been cleanin' up lately.{LF}Maybe you can handle this now.

translation: Permit me to repay you for your...kindness, my lady.{LF}I hope to suffer more...much more...of it soon.
source: Permit me to repay you for your...kindness, my lady.{LF}I hope to suffer more...much more...of it soon.

translation: A symbol of loyalty from me to you, my lady. {LF}May our mutual enjoyment endure for all time...and then some.
source: A symbol of loyalty from me to you, my lady. {LF}May our mutual enjoyment endure for all time...and then some.

translation: Yeah, maybe feel free to thank me now?{LF}I mean, I have been rather helpful.
source: Yeah, maybe feel free to thank me now?{LF}I mean, I have been rather helpful.

translation: Accord has posted a new request:
source: Accord has posted a new request:

translation: Access it from the Chapter Select menu!
source: Access it from the Chapter Select menu!

translation: Three Land of Seas requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}
source: Three Land of Seas requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}

translation: Three Land of Mountains requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}
source: Three Land of Mountains requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}

translation: Three Land of Forests requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}
source: Three Land of Forests requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}

translation: Three Land of Sands requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}
source: Three Land of Sands requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}

translation: Three Cathedral City requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}
source: Three Cathedral City requests completed!{LF}Bonus request "{04}

translation: I've got a new job I need help with,
source: I've got a new job I need help with,

translation: and I think you're just the woman to handle it.
source: and I think you're just the woman to handle it.

translation: I posted it to my list of requests,
source: I posted it to my list of requests,

translation: so check it out when you have a sec!
source: so check it out when you have a sec!
